title: Feature Request: Exporting Model to Eigen Only Environments
body_html:
This would be insanely useful. I understand that some operations don't map cleanly to Eigen operations.

https://github.com/riga/tfdeploy addresses a similar goal and has a reasonable approach to handle custom ops.

An API where the eigen only computational graph is generated and the ability to "plug in" missing ops?

This would be insanely useful. I understand that some operations don't map cleanly to Eigen operations. 

[https://github.com/riga/tfdeploy](https://github.com/riga/tfdeploy) addresses a similar goal and has a reasonable approach to handle custom ops. 

An API where the eigen only computational graph is generated and the ability to "plug in" missing ops?
